Uses of Interface
org.js4ms.io.channel.MessageInput

  • Packages that use MessageInput 
    Package Description
    org.js4ms.amt.gateway  
    org.js4ms.io.channel  
    org.js4ms.io.net  

    • Uses of MessageInput in org.js4ms.amt.gateway

      Classes in org.js4ms.amt.gateway that implement MessageInput 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AmtMulticastEndpoint
      A MulticastEndpoint that uses AMT to request and receive multicast datagrams sent to a specific multicast group address and UDP port number.

    • Uses of MessageInput in org.js4ms.io.channel

      Subinterfaces of MessageInput in org.js4ms.io.channel 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DuplexChannel<MessageType>
      Interface exposed by all duplex message channel objects.
      interface  InputChannel<MessageType>
      Interface exposed by all message input channel objects.
      interface  MessagePipe<MessageType>
      Interface exposed by objects that accept messages from a message sender source and make those messages available to a message receiver.
      Classes in org.js4ms.io.channel that implement MessageInput 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InputChannelAdapter<InnerMessageType,OuterMessageType>
      Abstract base class for all message input channels that transform or filter messages received from an inner message channel.
      class  InputChannelFilter<MessageType>
      An input channel adapter that uses a filter to determine which messages received from an inner input channel can be received from the adapter channel.
      class  InputChannelPipe<MessageType>
      A message input channel that receives messages from any object that implements the MessageInput interface.
      class  InputChannelTransform<InnerMessageType,OuterMessageType>
      An input channel adapter that transforms message objects received from another InputChannel into message objects of the same or different type.
      class  MessageQueue<MessageType>
      A message pipe that buffers messages in a fixed-size, blocking queue.
      Methods in org.js4ms.io.channel with parameters of type MessageInput 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void InputChannelPipe.connect(MessageInput<MessageType> pipe)
      Connects this input channel to the specified message pipe.
      Constructors in org.js4ms.io.channel with parameters of type MessageInput 
      Constructor and Description
      InputChannelPipe(MessageInput<MessageType> pipe)
      Constructs an input channel that is connected to the specified message pipe.

    • Uses of MessageInput in org.js4ms.io.net

      Subinterfaces of MessageInput in org.js4ms.io.net 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MulticastEndpoint
      Interface exposed by objects that forward multicast datagrams as requested using the join and leave methods.
      interface  UdpEndpoint
      A DuplexChannel used to send and receive UdpDatagram objects.
      Classes in org.js4ms.io.net that implement MessageInput 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UdpInputChannel
      An InputChannel that can be used to receive UdpDatagram instances from a UdpEndpoint.
      class  UdpSocketEndpoint
      A UdpEndpoint implementation that uses a DatagramChannel to provide transport.
